full_summary:
**Tender Notification: Kenworth T680E Electric Class VIII Tractor**
=====================================================================

**Title and Reference Information**
---------------------------------

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4273843461
* **Reference Number:** WS4273843461-Doc4274418271
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** October 26, 2023

**Notice Type and Solicitation Details**
--------------------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of one (1) Kenworth T680E Electric Class VIII Tractor and related items to Transport Canada (TC).

**Contracting Entity and End User Information**
--------------------------------------------

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) (Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux - SPAC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
	+ Contact: Valerie Matheson (SPAC/PSPC) - valerie.matheson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **End User Entity:** Department of Transport (TC) (Ministère des Transports - TC)
	+ Address: 330 Sparks Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0N8, Canada

**Tender Description and Criteria**
--------------------------------------

Canada is seeking offers for the provision of a Kenworth T680E Electric Class VIII Tractor and related items. The proposed contract will be awarded on the basis of lowest price. The proposed contract will be awarded on the basis of lowest price.

**Deadline and Instructions**
-----------------------------

* **Tender Closing Date:** December 4, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the deadline in order to be considered responsive**

You can view the full RFP on Ariba Discovery: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17838618?extsite=MTc4Mzg2MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17838618?extsite=MTc4Mzg2MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note: The tender has been cancelled, details of
